opis: Posredujemo u prodaji kuće u Slatinama na otoku Čiovo. Izgrađena je 2002. godine, a posljednje renovirana 2010. Prostire se na tri etaže, a sa svake se vidi more. Izgrađena je na zemljištu od 662m2 te je moguća izgradnja bazena. Udaljena je od mora samo 120 metara. Objekt zahtjeva renovaciju, prodaje se nenamješten. Postoji idejni projekt za renovaciju 5 luksuznih apartmana i bazen. Prve dvije etaže bi se sastojale od 4 luksuzna apartmana, a treća etaža bi bila veliki apartman od 152m2. ----------------------- We mediate in the sale of a house in Slatine on the island of Čiovo. It was built in 2002, and last renovated in 2010. It is spread over three floors, and from each one you can see the sea. It was built on a plot of land of 662m2 and it is possible to build a swimming pool. It is only 120 meters away from the sea. The building requires renovation, it is sold unfurnished. There is a conceptual project for the renovation of 5 luxury apartments and a swimming pool. The first two floors would consist of 4 luxury apartments, and the third floor would be a large apartment of 152m2.
